icon.description: uView has a built-in icon name, or image path
icon.description_zh: uView内置图标名称，或图片路径

text.description: Go back to the tooltip text for the top button
text.description_zh: 返回顶部按钮的提示文字

duration.description: Back to top Transition time in ms
duration.description_zh: 返回顶部过程中的过渡时间，单位ms

scrollTop.description: The scrolling distance of the page is obtained through the onPageScroll lifecycle
scrollTop.description_zh: 页面的滚动距离，通过onPageScroll生命周期获取

top.description: Displayed when the scrollbar slides how far it goes, in rpx
top.description_zh: 滚动条滑动多少距离时显示，单位rpx

bottom.description: The distance from the back button position to the bottom of the screen, in rpx
bottom.description_zh: 返回按钮位置到屏幕底部的距离，单位rpx

right.description: The distance from the back button position to the right side of the screen, in rpx
right.description_zh: 返回按钮位置到屏幕右边的距离，单位rpx

z-index.description: Go back to the hierarchy of the top buttons

iconStyle.description: The style of the icon, the form of the object

customStyle.description: Custom style for the outer layer of the button
customStyle.description_zh: 按钮外层的自定义样式

slots.name: default
slots.description: Customize everything about the back button
slots.description_zh: 自定义返回按钮的所有内容
